inn1.comm: starts off on the pads of Farhat - he gets a leg-bye
pitched up wide outside off, left alone
superb shot, Shahzaib gets a length ball outside off, and drives it over wide mid-off, and the timing takes it all the way
back of a length now, pushed to cover
stays on the back foot for this too, plays with an open face towards point
another top shot, Shahzaib is smacking anything that is pitched up to him. This time he goes over the bowler's head, high elbow and all
angled across him, stays low outside off, beats the outside edge
beaten outside off again, just the angle, and again it bounces in front of the keeper
too full, wide too, and he guides it past the second slip, all along the ground
flicked away off the hips, between mid-on and midwicket, gets two
full ball outside off, gets a thick edge towards point
shoulders arms outside off
Shahzaib is going for everything, this is not full enough, and he mis-hits it, but it just evades Razzak at mid-on
follows it up with a single to third man
on the pads, and Farhat takes a leg-bye
that's well bowled, just back of a length, straightening outside off, beating the bat that is playing for the angle
short, not too wide, he goes for the cut, gets an underside edge through to the keeper
and again, just outside off, and beats his circumspect bat - not giving him driving length at all
clipped off the pads, finds square leg
comes on the front foot and blocks a length ball back to the bowler
pushed to point, from just outside off
worked away off the pads, past midwicket
big wide down the leg side, tried the effort ball
another wide down the leg side, digging it in short, looking to tuck him up
pinches a single to mid-on who is right at the edge of the circle
punched wide of mid-off for one
gets another single wide of mid-off
poor bowling, short, on the pads, with fine leg up, flick-pulled for six
slower ball, gets a thick edge towards point
slower again, gets on top of it and defends
defended outside off
goes across the line but all along the ground, and finds the gap between mid-on and deep midwicket. Dragged from way outside off
punched away square, in front of point
presses forward to defend outside off
looks for the flick over short fine, the ball was angling down, but he misses and gets only a leg-bye
cuts, one bounce to point
looks for the big whip across the line, misses and gets a leg-bye
back of a length, loose in defence, gets an inside edge for one
spin introduced already. full, on the pads, played to midwicket
looks for the inside-out shot, not close to it and ends up playing more towards mid-off, luckily for him, it bounces in front of the fielder
flighted around, pushed to mid-off
goes for the ugly heave, ends up hitting it limply to mid-off
turning into the pads, worked around the corner
plays around his front pad, works it for one to square leg
angling into the pads, misses out. The fine leg is up
back of a length, steals a single wide of midwicket
heaved away upon having taken a step down the pitch, over square leg
takes a single to wide of mid-on
half-volley, and Shahzaib's lovin' it. Nicely drilled between the bowler and mid-on
steered away wide of short third, powerful shot followed by deft touch
flighted around off, blocked
goes for the big shot down the ground, hits it straight to mid-on
defended to mid-off
cut away, two bounces to point
short, cut away, gets a single wide of cover
plays around his front pad, straight to midwicket
pushed wide of mid-off for one
full, on the pads, worked away to the on side
full outside off, deadbatted
short, backs away to make room, and cuts between point and cover
lovely shot, makes room early, shows all his stumps, and then nicely chips it over extra cover. Lovely timing too, it lands about a foot inside the rope
makes room again, he fires it down the leg side, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
forced off the back foot, to midwicket
fired into the pads, worked away for one
tossed up around off, deadbatted
swept from outside off, gets a single to deep square leg
slight dip and turn, gets an inside edge from Farhat
fired into the pads, turned away to short fine
swept away from in front of stumps, gets a top edge but it is safe
driven down to long-off for one
paddled away fine
and again he manages to sweep it fine, and again he gets a couple
full into the pads, gets a n easy single to get to what has been an entertaining fifty
pushes this wide of cover for one
turning into the pads, helped away for an easy single
defended back to the bowler

this was a-coming. Shahzaib gets too far across with his front foot, and it is all a matter of missing one of those across-the-line shots. He missed here, and is caught plumb lbw. Entertaining innings nonetheless
defends off the back foot the first delivery he plays
comes forward and dead-bats this
another forward-defensive
flat offbreak, pushed back to the bowler
goes for the big sweep, is beaten
flat delivery, nice back-cut, past short third man. Nicely waited on it
straighter, no room, played back to the bowler
hit back to the bowler
Mahmud runs across to his left and makes a diving save to stop the single
into the pads, played to midwicket
gets a single wide of midwicket
turning into the pads, defended
looks to work this fine, can't beat short fine leg
looks for the pull shot, this isn't that short, and gets a bottom edge onto the pad
played down the ground, but straight midwicket does well
presses forward to defend an innocuous delivery
gets a single to long-off
flicked away to midwicket
driven to long-on for one
pushed to long-off for one
swept away fine off the pads
nicely driven away by Amin, he is listening! Between mid-off and extra cover, all along the ground
worked around the corner for one
gets a single wide of mid-off
short ball, pushed down to long-on
on the pads, pushed to midwicket
short outside off, cut to point
makes a diving save to his right to prevent the single to long-off
driven with the spin, past extra cover, gets a single
single to long-on
gets this past the straightish extra cover for a single to long-off
full ball, swept away to fine leg for one
long-on
driven, but straight to extra cover
swept nicely off the leg stump, once it got past short fine, it was four all the way
presses right forward to defend
gets a single to long-on
angled across him, steals a single to short third man
punched away, straight to extra cover
finds midwicket this time
gets off Nelson in style, dances down the track, gets under the length delivery and deposits it over long-on

run-out missed. Uncoordinated cricket all around. There is an lbw shout for the ball going way down the leg side, Farhat wants a non-existent single, Amin doesn't even look towards him, Farhat doesn't go back until he two-thirds of the way down, and then Mushfiq - who does the field - throws and misses. Had he seen how far down Farhat was, he could have jogged and removed the stumps
cut straight to point
nicely played down to long-on for one
looks to work it to leg, is hit on the pad
poor delivery, fired down the leg side, all Farhat needs to do it get a tickle past short fine
gets a single past extra cover to get to his fifty
misfield by Mashrafe at long-off, he comes down to field it but gets a slightly bad bounce that he lets go through his body. No touch on it
looks for the sweep, is hit in the pad
cut from in front of stumps, to point
lovely huge six! Right down the track, makes slight room to free his arms, and goes over long-off
paddles this to fine leg for one
shortish, pushed to mid-on

driven to long-off for one. Bizarre scenes here. Not quite in the spirit of the game. He has completed the single, goes back to the other side of the stumps because Mahmud is bowling round the stumps. While doing that, however, his bat is in the air, and Mahmud whips the bails and appeals for the run-out. They go to the third-umpire, and they can't do much once the team appeals. But common sense anybody?
gets a single past cover
turning in, worked away for one
full on the pads, worked away into the leg side to get off the mark first ball
cut away past point for another single
good start for Asad, gets a nice short and wide delivery, and cuts it powerfully between point and cover
he has over-stepped, defended by Asad, free hit coming up
and Asad is getting all the gifts, and is refusing to look into the gift horse's mouth. Nicely clears the front leg and sweeps the free hit over midwicket
pushed to square leg
long hop, pulled to deep midwicket
nicely tossed up and nicely defended
driven down to long-on for one
short and wide, cut away powerfully, between point and short third
swept fine, almost from in front of middle
and he gets a wicket first ball! Farhat is getting more and more adventurous, looks for the late-cut this time, making room, but it is in front of off, and he misses and the off stump is disturbed
nicely defended off the front foot
dead-bats another delivery
arm ball, Akmal equal to it, stays back and defends
lovely shot, leaning into this flighted delivery, and square-driving it, all along the ground, and through the gap
into the pads, flat, defended to square leg
into the pads, worked away off the pads
looks to cut, is beaten outside off
fired into the pads, worked to square leg
punched wide of midwicket for one
nice inside-out drive, but finds extra cover
worked around the corner for one
driven down to long-off for one
low full toss, driven down to long-off for one
another single to long-off
long-ff kept busy again
drops it with soft hands, just off the pitch, and steals the single
moved across and defended to on
full ball, hit back to the bowler
into the pads, worked away with the angle
pushed to long-off for one
cut away, can't get it past point
single to long-off
single to long-on
slog-swept powerfully, past midwicket
follows it up with a single past cover
presses forward and defends
well bowled, draws him out with the flight and dip, and then he finds he is not to the pitch of it, and then the ball turns past the face and gets him stumped. No. 100 for Shakib
belts out a huge lbw shout, but umpire says he got an edge as he went to sweep
presses froward and pushes this to point
pushed back to the bowler
swept away fine, fine of fine leg
another fine paddle sweep, another couple
driven to extra cover for one
worked away from outside off into the leg side
looks to paddle again, doesn't make connection
driven to wide long-on for one
whipped away from outside off, gets a single to midwicket
pushed wide of long-on, with soft hands, gets a couple
punched away past extra cover
walks across the off stump, Shakib slows it down in the air, Afridi defends
comes forward and works with behind square for one
top shot, makes room, comes down the track, and lofts him over wide long-off
long hop now, and he rocks back and pulls him over midwicket for four
defends this back to the bowler
short and wide, cut away, wide of sweeper-cover, comes back for two
worked into the on side to retain strike
driven down to long-off for one
looks for the big sweep shot, misses
pushed down to long-on for a single
worked around the corner for one
short, pulled away between deep square and deep midwicket
worked off the pads, gets a single
slower ball, driven back hard, Shafiul fields
full ball, driven down to long-off for one
unnecessary attempt at direct hit from Mahmud from point, and he gives away an overthrow
driven powerfully down to long-on
driven past extra cover
driven through extra cover for a single
cut away, finds point
another cut shot, Tamim fumbles at point and they take two off the ricochet
worked away with soft hands, between deep square and fine leg, comes back for two
stretches forward to defend
pushes powerfully, but straight to extra cover
tries the bouncer, Afridi lets it go, called one for the over
gives it the bath tub, gets a thick inside edge, between the keeper and short fine leg
slower short ball, looks to run it down the third man, beaten by the slowness
mowed away to midwicket for one
looks for a short single on the on side, but hits it to midwicket
late cut, wide of third man, Mashrafe dives but can't prevent it from going for four

a ball after letting that four through, Mashrafe has dropped a sitter from Afridi, who comes down the track and makes room, getting too far from the ball, and his bottom hand comes off as he plays this. The ball skies towards mid-on, Mashrafe runs in from long-on, but he never has it under control, and it pops out
runs this down to short third for a tight single
defended back to the bowler
cuts this from in front of the stumps, finds the fielder
short and wide, and again he finds the point fielder
and again he can't beat the point fielder
it's not raining for Mash, it's absolutely pouring. He starts off with a a gentle length ball of a loosener, and Afridi drives it on the up, between mid-off and extra cover
shorter, worked away for one to on
looks to run this down to third man, but because it is a slower one, he finds point
walks down the pitch and pushes at it, can't get it past straightish extra cover

Tamim Iqbal goes for the broke and pays the price! This is flicked in the air towards deep square, Tamim runs in, goes for the catch, it bounces in front of him and bounces over him for four. he could have easily stayed back and saved the boundary, but he took the risk. Can't fault him
short and wide, cuts, but is beaten
full, on the pads, flicked to midwicket for one
played square of the wicket, into the gap, takes a couple
worked around the corner for one
deadbats this off the front foot
short and flat, stays back and pushes it down to long-on
one run down to long=on
driven, but straight to extra cover
slower ball, driven down to long-off
slower ball, not in total control, but it seems he opens the face at the last moment, and he gets four off the outside half of the bat
this is 100% intentional, cut away ruthlessly, between third man and deep point. Brings up his fifty too
angled in, worked away off the pads, gets a single
steered down to third man, wide of him in fact, gets back for two
soft hands, just wide of short third, gets a single
big wide down the leg side
short, and pulled away to wide long-on
lovely lovely shot, nonchalant, makes room, stands tall, chips him over extra cover. No power, just timing
fired in flat, takes a single to long-on
looks to work it to on, gets a leading edge towards the bowler
flat into the pads, worked around the corner for one
worked to short fine for one
premeditated, but brute Afridi power! Stands back, exposes all three stumps, Mahmud bowls flat, and he wallops it over cover
finds the deep fielder this time, with a similar shot, not that short this time
pushed down to long-on to hand over the strike
makes room again, Mahmud bowls short again, and he has been drilled over extra cover
Afridiiiii! What murderous power. Comes down the track, and hits it just wide of long-off. he has a few yards to his left to field it, but stands no chance. This is absolutely smoked away
beats him outside off with a slower one
walks down the ground, takes a single to long-off, Boom Boom on strike again
six No. 270 for Lala, equalling Sanatha Jayasuriya's world record! Length ball on the pads, and he lofts it over midwicket. Easy does it
full outside off, he gets a thick edge, and that goes fine of third man. Everything he touches seems to go to the boundary
and another, threw everything at this, toe end of the bat goes fine of third man
slower  ball, and he plays the cute one this time, walking across the stumps, exploiting the short fine leg, flicking this over his head
takes a single down the ground, over to Boom Boom
again Afridi makes room, this time he bowls wide of off, too wide
and he makes room again, and Shakid bowls a full toss outside off, and he lofts it square over the infield
Shakib has lost it! another full toss, and he smites it through extra cover for another four. Within one shot of a hundred
full toss again! Finds sweeper-cover this time
and quietly Akmal gets to his fifty with a single to square leg
full, cramping him up, he gets a single to long-on to retain strike
lovely cover-drive, extra cover manages to get a hand to it. Only a single
Akmal gone! Looks for the slog sweep off the fast bowler. Shafi bowls the yorker, it hits him on the pad, and onto the stumps
hits the first ball uppishly, it bounces in front of extra cover, Razzak, and he lets it through
full ball, hit straight to mid-on
goes for the yorker, bowls too full down the leg side
Razzak misfields again at extra cover, and conceded two when it should be one
guides this down to third man for one
fired down the pads, misses, hit on the pad
pushes this to midwicket to hand over the strike
lovely century for Shahid Khan Afridi! Fired down the leg side, and he helps it along its way past short fine. Only two sixes in the innings. Top quality
hit powerfully but straight to cover
short, too short, he rocks back and cuts it mercilessly, he is unstoppable
that's it! The record is all his! Six No. 271. And easily, fluidly, he lofts him over long-off
full and straight, gets a single to sweeper-cover for one
Oof! Afridi not done yet! Length ball, clears the front leg, and lofts it over wide long-on. Lovely clean strike, and this is no Mickey Mouse boundary
nothing can go wrong for Lala! yorker down the leg side, he gets a faint bottom edge onto the pad, and it flies between the keeper and short third man
backs way early, he follows him with a short ball, he manages to somehow pull it for one
nice slower bouncer, beaten, it bounces in front of Rahim, he doesn't collect cleanly, and they steal a bye
one-handed pull, carries all the way to deep midwicket! Short ball, wide outside off, Afridi has to stretch to reach it, the bottom hand comes off, he still times it well, and holes out
pushed down to long-on for one
gets a single to midwicket
Pakistan get to 350 with this off-balance sweep, still he manages to find the boundary, past short fine
cuts this from in front of middle and off, but can't beat point
pushed nicely between long-on and deep midwicket, comes back for two
short ball, he makes room and cuts in front of square, past extra cover, and Shafiul has not lost spirit, he gives in a superb chase to save one run
length ball, massive power behind this slog sweep, Imrul Kayes dives to his right from deep midwicket to keep them down to two
slower short one, and Akmal waits for it, and upper-cuts it, over point. Nice, smart shot, exploiting the strong leg-side field
goes for the big slog, clearing the front leg, Shafiul rolls his fingers on it, and Akmal ends up slicing it high, and Tamim runs back from mid-off to take the catch
all barrels firing! Razzaq this time, making room, smoking this length ball over extra cover. No respite for Deshis
that's a Razzq special! Makes room, clears the front leg, and lofts this clean over wide long-on. Lovely shot, takes Pakistan to their highest ODI total. Of all time
short one, he hits it weakly but the single means he retains strike for the last over
hit down the ground, wide of long-on, comes back for two
yorker with this, is looking for the big wind-up but well bowled
that has hit Mushfiq in the face. Another yorker, beats Razzaq outside off, kicks off a footmark, hits Rahim in the shoulder, then in the face
makes room, hits, but is too close to it, doesn't get the elevation, only a single to long-on
Rehman hands over the strike with a gentle single to midwicket
Razzaq shows why he should have been given the strike, just clears his arms and it goes flying, straight of long-off for six

inn2.comm: gets a leading edge as he looks to turn it to leg, along the ground towards cover
looks to clip this to leg, hit in the thigh, just back of a length
outside off, left alone
looks to clip this to leg, but it gets big on hi, he manages to keep it down
keeps him honest still, fast, just back of a length, pushed to midwicket
length ball, drops and runs, gets a single before extra cover can come in
Tamim seems to have made his mind to see Akhtar off and hit others, charges at the first ball from Asif, and doesn't connect at all
on the pads, nicely clipped away to deep square leg
nicely behind it to push it back to the bowler
slashes at one outside off, no contact
fuller, straighter too, he misses out on it, gets just a leg-bye
nice shot, half-volley all right, but nicely crunched between mid-off and extra cover
back of a length, middle and leg, played back to the bowler
extra bounce outside off, beats him
pushed to point
nicely bowled, just outside off, beats him with the slight seam movement
short one, thinks about the upper-cut, but perishes the thought
back of a length, punched down to mid-off, maiden over, 7 for 0 after three, chasing 386
full on the pads, clipped away, past short fine for two
finally they get a move one, nice juicy long hop, and Tamim pulls it in front of square, past midwicket. More the Tamim we know
on the pads but can't get it past midwicket
nice shot, length ball, and lofted over mid-off, no problems with that
hit to midwicket, Tamim is sent back. Rightly, because Umar Akmal was quickly onto it
offcutter, squares him, gets a leading edge, along the ground towards extra cover
back of a length, played to cover
short, outside off, Imrul drops his wrists as he lets it through
back of a length, pitched middle, towards off, pushed to cover, still not off the mark
length ball, gets behind it, defends it nicely
nice bouncer, Kayes ducks under it, but it follows him, has to sway his head out of the line
second straight maiden played out by Kayes. 0 off 15 now. Chasing 386. Well bowled Akhtar, though, not giving him anything to drive
Tamim, though, is playing a different game. Anything pitched up from Asif is going. Over mid-off again
jumps out of the crease, and slices it over covers. Back of a length, but still manages to clear the infield
down the leg side, Tamim tries his best to get a touch to it, but even off the pad it beats short fine leg
Tamim tries the big shot down down the ground and misses
angling into the pads, works it away for one
nicely behind its line again, and another defensive stroke
clipped off the pads, gets a single
length ball, pitching middle and leg, angling away, defended back to him
another defensive push from Kayes - three overs he has faced for no run
tucks him up with one into the ribs, turned around to square leg, still no run
bouncer, ducks under it
nicely played, just back of a length, and he goes straight over his head. Not the best of the hits, but he has chosen the right area to go to
defends this time
lovely shot, charges at him, sees a short delivery, leans back to make room and cuts it past point
Asad Shafiq just got lobbed! Nicel flick in the air, but Asad is standing way inside the square-leg fence, and watches it sail over his head

gone! Tamim is gone! Only hope for Bangladesh! Charges at him again, Asif bowls the short one, and he looks for the cut again, but there is slight extra bounce that takes the edge this time, and the difference between four and dismissal
pushes one to cover, just back of a length
Imrul wants a suicidal single to get off the mark. Just pushed towards mid-off and ran, Junaid sends him back
half-hearted drive outside off, that's perhaps why the edge doesn't carry to second slip. Had it carried, would surely have been one of the longest ducks
back to middle and off line, back to a defensive push to the bowler
finally off the mark, off the 24th delivery he faces, through a thick edge to third man
tucks him up, but he works it off his ribs with one
nice bouncer, he looks to get his head out of the bay, but it follows him and gets him in the helmet
looks to force it through off side, can't beat cover
lovely delivery, Asif hitting the rhythm, from round the wicket, angling in, just back of a length, then moving away a touch, beating him. An excited Akmal shouts but there is nothing on it
and again he beats him outside off, lovely line from round the stumps, making them play, then just leaving them a touch
Asif's shrewd mind at work here, this time follows those two with one that goes with the angle. Beats him again, but the lbw shout is denied because of the height
beats the outside edge this time, playing around with Junaid here
extra bounce, drops his bottom hand, and manages to keep it down towards third man
almost run out again, Junaid drops and runs, but it has gone straight to short cover. Rightly sent back
nice clean shot, half-volley, and he lofts it straight over his head
back of a length, around off, punched away, to cover
long hop, no pace behind it, and pulled away ruthlessly, past midwicket
shout for lbw, but pitched outside leg, and missing off with the angle
lovely shot, punched away on the up, through extra cover
back of a length, around off, pushed back
flicked away off the pads, past midwicket, comes back for two
takes this from off, works it into the leg side for one
punched away to mid-off
pulled away, not convincing at all, past midwicket, gets two, lazy running, they thought this was going for four
worked off the hips, gets a single
extra bounce, catching him on the front foot with a short delivery, the inside edge misses the leg stump
gets a single to third man
that's a top shot from Kayes, punched away wide off mid-off, that should multiply his strike-rate by four or five
two scoring shots in a row, not bad at all, a single to third man
looks to punch this away, but is cramped for room
worked away to fine leg for one
pushed to midwicket
looks to force this through the off side, gets big on him
looks to pull off the front foot, finds midwicket
nicely directed bouncer, beats him on the pull, following him with the angle
second slip? no second slip. Thick edge as Asif makes him push away from his body, but there is nobody to accept it
extra bounce again, hits him on the thigh
another shout for lbw, again pitching outside leg, and also high
back of a length, pushed to midwicket
worked away off the pads, gets a single
punched off the back foot to mid-on
gets a single to long-off
worked off the pads for another single
turned away with the spin, straight to short fine
pushed to long-on for one
defended to midwicket
flat outside off, pushed to deep point
angled into the pads, worked away for a single
and again an easy single into the on side
worked off the hips for a single
driven on the up, towards sweeper-cover
back of a length, just outside off, pushed to extra cover
slower ball, on the pads, worked around the corner
pushed to long-off for one
another quiet little push to long-off for one
full ball, driven down to long-on for one
shorter, rocks back to get a single to sweeper-cover
full, into the pads, gets a single to long-on
turning in, turned away to square leg
chips down the track, pushes it to long-on for one
wants a single but is sent back as he has hit it straight to square leg
Junaid hits straight to cover, calls Imrul for one and then sends him back. Just in time
back of a length, no room, hit back to the bowler
short delivery, looks to guide it past the keeper but is beaten by the slowness
slower bouncer, pulled along the ground to deep square leg
back of a length, hit to midwicket
punched straight to straightish extra cover
hit back to the bowler
cut away for a single
leading edge as he looks to run this down to leg side, but it is safe
dances down the track, pushes it down to long-on
goes back into the crease to play it back to the bowler
gets an inside edge onto the pad
beaten outside off, quick delivery
worked away off the pads, gets one
off the back foot, hit straight to extra cover
driven inside-out, Umar Akmal makes a diving save at extra cover
cut away through the covers
swept fine, nicely paddled away fine of fine leg
quicker one, beaten on the cut
pushed to midwicket
nice dip on it, but the batsman chips down and pushes it for one
flatter one, pushed down to long-on for one
wide down the leg side
helped off the pads for one
looks to late-cut, is beaten outside off
pushed back to the bowler, flat and shortish
offbreak, swept away from outside leg
goes with the angle, cut away for one
legbreak outside off, too short, and cut away
full ball, played to square leg
short ball, hit to midwicket
flighted ball, around the pad, played straight to midwicket
another hit straight to midwicket
worked off the pads, gets a single to deep square
played to midwicket again
flat delivery, played straight to midwicket
full, hit back to the bowler
played off the pads for a single
another single off the pads
full ball, defended to cover
quicker ball, late-cut, straight to short third
turned straight to midwicket
dances down the track, pushes it down to long-on
straighter one, gets a leading edge, but along the ground
flighted on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket
swept away to deep fine leg
extra bounce, the bottom edge doesn't hit the stumps
flighted delivery outside leg, swept to short fine for one
pushed down to long-on for another single
driven through extra cover for a single
turned away to short fine leg
cut away for a single
flat delivery, hit to the right of the bowler
charges down the track to take a single to long-on
worked around the corner for a single
how did that miss? pushes outside the line of the ball, and somehow it misses the off stump
pushed to long-on for another single
gets a single to midwicket
full ball, hit back to the bowler
pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
flat outside off, beaten
turned away to midwicket
legbreak, full outside off, blocked
worked away with the turn, gets a single to short fine leg
flicked away to long-on
short, pulled away for one
full toss, hit straight to midwicket
they steal a single to short fine, and that's pretty much the only urgency they have shown today
worked to square leg for one
nicely worked away for a single
full ball, hit to mid-off
runs this down to third man
wide down the leg side
steers this down to third man for one
tucks him up, worked away off the hips, gets a single, torturous fifty for Junaid, that will improve your average, sir
flighted, around the leg-stump line, defended
cokes down the track, flicked to midwicket
pulled away wide of deep midwicket for two
pushed to long-on for one
full on the pads, flicked away
worked away, all along the carpet
single to long-on
first attempt at hitting a four, and he top-edges this pull
leading edge as he looks to turn this to leg
single to long-off
helps this to short fine leg for one
swept away to deep square for one
played past midwicket
pushed down to long-on for one
comes forward to defend
pushes it into the covers for one
looks to play it to fine leg, is hit in the pad
appeal for lbw, but pitching off and angling away. Billy Doctrove is awake
first boundary since the 14th over, and not intended either, runs off the outside edge past the keeper. Another fifty. That should please him
swept away for one
tries the big sweep shot, beaten outside off
flicked off the pads, wide of fine leg, gets a couple
back of a length, played to cover
pulled away fine, gets a single to fine leg
whipped away from outside off for a single
punched away to sweeper-cover for one
gets an inside edge onto the pad
uppishly punched past mid-off
another single to short fine leg
driven to long-off
almost a return catch, didn't expect it, and it came too fast at him
another possible catch, Asif goes for it, a lofted sweep, he runs in from deep square but lets it through for four
swept away for one, doesn't carry to deep midwicket
punched down the ground for one
finally a proper shot! I wonder why! comes down the track, makes room, and flat-bats it over long-off
another powerful hit down the ground, hits the non-striker's end's stump, gets two off the ricochet
another six! woohooo! he has slogged a length delivery from outside off and over wide long-on
pushed down the ground for one to long-on
late-cuts, but can't beat Umar Akmal at point
slower bouncer, pulls out of the pull shot
cut away, short and wide, and in front of sweeper-cover
drops and runs, gets a single
the follow-on has been avoided! worked to short fine leg for another single
another single to short fine
pulled away one bounce to deep square leg
flicked away off the hips to get a single
worked away off the pads to get to his personal best. He will remember this for decades
hoicked away wide of deep midwicket
gets a single to short third man
played straight to the match
looks for the big shot, misses, hit on the pad
looks for a single to short fine, but is sent back
swept away, doesn't time well, gets a single to short fine
comes down the track, gets right to the pitch of the ball, and drills this down past mid-off
looks to turn this to leg, gets a leading edge towards short third for one
finally a wicket! Looks for the big hoick over midwicket, gets a leading that loops to short third man. Sigh
wide down the leg side
looks to drop and run, but Junaid is not interested
extra bounce, cuts, but plays straight to short third
flat on the pads, worked away for one
short and wide, beaten on the cut shot
off the mark with a single past cover
wide down the leg side
slow-motion running, slow-motion, throw. pushed to midwicket for a single, it is a tight run, but Rahim is princely in taking the run, and Umar hits the stumps direct with him one frame short
flat delivery, Shakib gets off the mark with a single to deep midwicket
flat on the pads again, and another single ensues
starts off with a wide down the leg side
back of a length, takes a single to midwicket
short delivery, pulled away sweetly, gets a single to deep square leg
back of a length, around off, no room, defended
pushed wide of deep cover

just as well that he has got out! He didn't deserve an international century! Looks to drive down the ground, the ball holds up a touch, and he lobs it back to Shoaib. No celebration from Pakistan, and Junaid is stunned. Shoaib shakes Junaid's hand on the way back
bouncer outside off, he gets out of the way
thank God for some constants in life! Kamran Akmal has dropped one! Difficult edge, though, a thick one and a decent deflection. But thankfully some things never change
nice copy-book forward-defensive
gets a single down the ground
worked to short fine for one
comes down the track to defend this one
nicely behind a short one to block it. Immaculate defensive technique
beaten as he looks for the cut. No feet there
drops this to cover and steals a single
short outside off, too wide
bouncer outside off, left alone
tip-and-run, gets a single before cover fielder can come in
nicely hooked away, over square leg
slower  ball, full, flicked away wide of deep midwicket, where Shahzaib is extremely disinterested and slow in fielding. They run four - and this is not MCG
pulled away, but doesn't make good connection
leading edge back to the bowler as he looks to turn it to leg
played with soft hands towards long-on, and they come back for two
full toss, hit into the on side for one
full outside off, gets a toe end that goes through Akmal's legs. Nothing a keeper could have done there
looks for the slog sweep, is hit on the pad
flatter, quicker, defended
steals a single to short third
inside edge as he looks to defend, gets a single
pushed through, beats him on the cut
looks to cut, is beaten outside off
Asif trying to wake them out of their slumber by overstepping. free-hit coming up
at least he tried to pull, is beaten by the short one
back of a length, pushed down to long-off
back of a length, beats him as he tries to whip it to the on side
slower short ball, pulled past short fine leg, that takes their fours tally to 17, equal to what Afridi hit
slogged away for two, square of fine leg
plays with soft hands, steals a single
is beaten as he looks to turn this to leg
flat and quick, hurries him into a defensive shot
Farhat gets a wicket! hits the stumps as he looks to cut it, beaten for pace
defended with an open face, towards short third
flighted delivery, nicely pushed to extra cover
pushes this to sweeper-cover for one
looks for cut, is beaten
short outside off, beaten
full ball, driven to extra cover
gets a bottom edge as he looks to cut
that's it, the Test has been saved! Well done Bangladesh. Fittingly they finish it off with a defensive shot
